Text:
THIS IS THE SAME ENCYCLOPEDIA THAT COSTS $1,645 ON AMAZON!

IF I MAY ASK, HOW DID YOU GET THIS?
IT DOESN'T LOOK PHOTOCOPIED EXCEPT FOR THE COVER!

IF IT WAS PHOTOCOPIED, (JUST CURIOUS) HOW LONG DID IT TAKE YOU TO DO ALL THOSE PAGES?

ONE MORE QUESTION, ISN'T THERE SUPPOSED TO BE 4,600 PAGES , NOT 3,944?

THANK YOU SO MUCH!!!!  :)
Really $1,645! That should criminal. And they wonder why people download!
